title: Antietam National Battlefield: News Releases
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases               News Releases           Subscribe  | What is RSS     July 08, 2016  Farm Land Available at Antietam  197 acres at Antietam Battlefield are available starting 1 Oct for farming through the park's special park use permit program.   May 19, 2016  2016 Memorial Day Program  2016 Memorial Day Program at Antietam National Battlefield   May 10, 2016  NPS Seeks Comments on Invasive Plant Management Plan  NPS seeking public comment   April 14, 2016  Junior Ranger Day 2016  Come out to the park on April 16, 2016 for Junior Ranger Day.   October 07, 2015  Burnside Bridge Closed for Repairs  On October 10 the Burnside Bridge will be closed for major repairs to the historic structure.   September 02, 2015  4th Grade Park Passes Available  Antietam National Battlefield launches Every Kid in a Park Pass. Fourth graders and their families eligible for free Access to federal lands and waters nationwide   April 06, 2015  Washignton DC Area National Parks Join Find Your Park Movement  National Park Week 2015 Encourages Everyone to Find Your Park   September 24, 2014  NPS Approves Battlefield White-Tailed Deer Management Plan  NPS Deer Management Plan Approval
